sentences.english: Achieved Vicious Gladiator title. Achieved Ruthle Gladiator title.
sentences.chinese: 獲得頭銜“暴藍田墨玉怒角鬥士”。

sentences.english: Pebbled leather gladiator sandals in black.
sentences.chinese: 鵝卵石皮革黑角鬥士涼鞋。

sentences.english: Gladiator-inspired sandals are made of reptile-embossed synthetic leather.
sentences.chinese: 角鬥士的靈感涼鞋的爬行動物壓花合成革。

sentences.english: It makes me think of contemporary gladiators.
sentences.chinese: 這讓我想起歷史上的角鬥士。

sentences.english: The tickets for “Gladiator” have been sold out.
Gladiators fought with lions in the arena in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 在古羅馬的角鬥場上，角鬥士與獅子搏鬥。

sentences.english: The main event was the gladiators.
sentences.chinese: 而主要的賽事則是角鬥士的競技。
